title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 16
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 16:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Bass & Davis - The Courage to Heal; a Guide for Women Survivors of Child Sexual Abuse, 3e (1994)

-  Borneman - Cruel Attachments; the Ritual Rehab of Child Molesters in Germany (2015)

-  Cawthorne - Against Their Will; Sadistic Kidnappers and the Courageous Stories of Their Innocent Victims (2012)

-  Champion - Narcissism and Entitlement; Sexual Aggression and the College Male (2002)

-  Chan - Understanding Sexual Homicide Offenders; an Integrated Approach (2015)

-  Clark & Pino - We Believe You; Survivors of Campus Sexual Assault Speak Out (2016)

-  Cozzens - Sacred Silence; Denial and the Crisis in the Church (2002)

-  Daly - The Circles of Investigations for Child Sexual Assault Allegations (2016)

-  DeKeseredy & Corsianos - Violence Against Women in Pornography (2016)

-  Dinsmore - From Surviving to Thriving; Incest, Feminism, and Recovery (1991)

-  Durham - Young Men Surviving Child Sexual Abuse; Research Stories and Lessons for Therapeutic Practice (2003)

-  Foote & Goodman-Delahunty - Evaluating Sexual Harassment; Psychological, Social and Legal Considerations in Forensic Examinations (2005)

-  Ford - Women Who Sexually Abuse Children (2006)

-  Gross - Hannah Mary Tabbs and the Disembodied Torso; a Tale of Face, Sex, and Violence in America (2016)

-  Healicon - The Politics of Sexual Violence; Rape, Identity and Feminism (2016)

-  Hooper - Mothers Surviving Child Sexual Abuse (1992)

-  Itzin - Home Truths About Child Sexual Abuse; Influencing Policy and Practice; a Reader (2000)

-  John Jay College - The Causes and Context of Sexual Abuse of Minors by Catholic Priests in the United States, 1950-2010 (2011)

-  Jones (Ed.) - Understanding Child Sexual Abuse; Perspectives from the Caribbean (2013)

-  Langberg - On the Threshold of Hope; Opening the Door to Healing for Survivors of Sexual Abuse (1999)

-  Laws & O'Donohue (Eds.) - Treatment of Sex Offenders; Strengths and Weaknesses in Assessment and Intervention (2016)

-  McDowell & Steward - My Friend Is Struggling with Past Sexual Abuse (2000)

-  McGuire - At the Dark End of the Street; Black Women, Rape, and Resistance... (2010)

-  O'Donohue & Fanetti (Eds.) - Forensic Interviews Regarding Child Sexual Abuse; a Guide to Evidence-Based Practice (2016)

-  Quilligan - Incest and Agency in Elizabeth's England (2005)

-  Raphael - Rape is Rape; How Denial, Distortion, and Victim Blaming are Fueling a Hidden Acquaintance Rape Crisis (2013)

-  Reavey & Warner (Eds.) - New Feminist Stories of Child Sexual Abuse; Sexual Scripts and Dangerous Dialogues (2003)

-  Ricker - The Ultimate Betrayal; the Enabling Mother, Incest and Sexual Abuse (2006)

-  Rosen - Dealing with the Effects of Rape and Incest (2002)

-  Rowan - Understanding Child Sexual Abuse (2006)

-  Thomas - Sex Crime; Sex Offending and Society, 3e (2016)

-  Waterhouse-Watson - Athletes, Sexual Assault, and 'Trials by Media' (2013)

-  Wolf & Durham (Eds.) - Inbreeding, Incest, and the Incest Taboo; the State of Knowledge at the Turn of the Century (2005)

-  Woodiwiss - Contesting Stories of Childhood Sexual Abuse (2009)

-  Wooten & Mitchell (Eds.) - The Crisis of Campus Sexual Violence; Critical Perspectives on Prevention and Response (2016)
